sqlMap.statement:
SELECT COLUMNNAME AS "COLUMNNAME" , COLUMNDESC AS "COLUMNDESC" , COLUMNLENGTH AS "COLUMNLENGTH" , ISKEY AS "ISKEY" , KEYSEQ AS "KEYSEQ" , ISINTERFACE AS "ISINTERFACE" , COMBONAME AS "COMBONAME" , COMBODEPTH AS "COMBODEPTH" , COLUMNDEFAULT AS "COLUMNDEFAULT" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHS03
COLUMNNAME = #columnName#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIHS03 ( COLUMNNAME , COLUMNDESC , COLUMNLENGTH , ISKEY , KEYSEQ , ISINTERFACE , COMBONAME , COMBODEPTH , COLUMNDEFAULT ) VALUES ( #columnName# , #columnDesc# , #columnLength# , #isKey# , #keySeq# , #isInterface# , #comboName# , #comboDepth# , #columnDefault# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAIHS03 SET COLUMNDESC = #columnDesc# , COLUMNLENGTH = #columnLength# , ISKEY = #isKey# , KEYSEQ = #keySeq# , ISINTERFACE = #isInterface# , COMBONAME = #comboName# , COMBODEPTH = #comboDepth# , COLUMNDEFAULT = #columnDefault# WHERE COLUMNNAME = #columnName#
